faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about color analysis

questions.q2: How to prepare for a color analysis?
questions.q3: When will I receive the results?
questions.q4: In‑person or online analysis – which should I choose?
questions.q5: How much time do I need to prepare for the analysis?
questions.q6: Is color analysis useful for men?
questions.q7: What will I receive after the color analysis?
questions.q8: How long are the results of the color analysis valid?
questions.q9: What if I disagree with the analysis results?
questions.q10: Can I book the analysis together with a friend?
questions.q11: Can one determine their beauty type by comparing oneself to others?
questions.q12: I will fill out the form — what happens next?

answers.a1: Color analysis is not just about identifying a season and subtype—it’s a comprehensive process of creating an individual color palette that best harmonizes with the natural tones of your skin, hair, and eyes. With the analysis, you’ll discover which palette accentuates your natural beauty and which might make you look tired or older.
answers.a2: For the analysis, send several photos taken in natural daylight, against a white background, without makeup, jewelry, or glasses. If you dye your hair, wait until regrowth is visible. Hold up color samples near your face—they can be your clothes, towels, bedding, or family members’ garments; the important part is to showcase a full range of basic colors.
answers.a3: You will receive results within up to 10 business days. If you choose the comprehensive color analysis package, you’ll also have the opportunity to discuss your results during a 30‑minute consultation.
answers.a4: Both formats have their advantages, but online analysis undoubtedly wins in terms of time efficiency. You don’t need to take a day off or travel for hours to find out which colors suit you best. I only need a few of your photos to determine your color palette with the same level of precision. Moreover, atmospheric conditions, time of day, and season can influence the outcome—online analysis provides more consistent conditions and thus greater accuracy.
answers.a5: Very little. You’ll complete a brief form answering questions about your features and favorite or avoided colors, and send some photos of your face with different color samples—and that’s it.
answers.a6: Absolutely! Color analysis is just as beneficial for men as it is for women. Men’s color palettes tend to be more muted. The analysis helps select suitable colors for suits, shirts, sweaters, and other wardrobe items, resulting in a more professional and appealing look.
answers.a7: Depending on the package you choose, you may receive additional benefits such as a follow‑up consultation or a custom keychain to help avoid poor color choices when shopping. Every package includes a personalized report with your palette and styling, makeup, and accessory recommendations.
answers.a8: Color analysis is a lifelong investment—you do it once and enjoy it forever. Beauty type doesn’t change with age. While your appearance may soften with graying hair, you won’t become the opposite type. That’s why investing makes sense—to enjoy harmonious shopping, styling, and hair color decisions for years to come.
answers.a9: It can happen that your favorite color belongs to your opposite type’s palette—meaning it may not suit you. I’ve had the same experience with light blue. But remember: this analysis is a report with objective advice on what suits you best. You don’t have to give up your beloved colors or force yourself to wear colors you don’t like.
answers.a10: Certainly! Bringing another person grants both of you a 10% discount on the analysis.
answers.a11: Absolutely not. Color analysis or determining your beauty type is not about asking 'who do I resemble?' but 'which colors suit me?'. Numerous factors determine beauty type; two nearly identical individuals might receive different results due to subtle traits or undertones not obvious at first glance.
answers.a12: When you submit the form, you will choose your preferred method of contact. Once I receive your message by email, I will get in touch with you using the contact method you selected. Then, I will send you a questionnaire about your beauty features along with instructions on how to take your photos.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph1: My name is Joanna Kluczewska—and colors are my key to happiness. They accompany me every day: in fashion, graphics, and interiors... but color in fashion became my professional passion. My mission is to help women discover their natural beauty through conscious color selection.
aboutMe.paragraph2: My fascination with colors began in childhood—when I curiously wondered why some people shine cool, icy elegance while others glow with warm, Mediterranean brightness. That childhood question turned into a passion, and my passion became my profession.
aboutMe.paragraph3: I am a certified color analyst, but technical knowledge is as important to me as subtlety and kindness. Not only do I choose color palettes that align with your beauty type, but I also encourage experimentation with lighter shades and wearing black less often.
aboutMe.paragraph4: If you want to understand which hues accentuate your beauty and gain a tool that changes how you shop for clothes — feel warmly invited to Soft Academy.

reviews.name: Lena
reviews.content: You can spend thousands on the wrong clothes, ill‑matched hair colors, makeup that drains you—and still not know what truly suits you. I finally decided to invest once—and well. This color analysis was the best decision—thorough, beautifully presented, very professional consultation. It’s a lifetime investment that works in your wardrobe, at the hairdresser, when choosing glasses or lipstick. Every woman should do it!

reviews.name: Dominika
reviews.content: At first I was skeptical about the online version, but now I think it was spot on. The effect was absolutely the same as in‑person—wonderful presentation, very precise consultation, and I could do it without commuting or wasting the whole day. Convenient, professional, and classy!

reviews.name: Martyna
reviews.content: I live in a bigger city where there are color analysts, but I chose yours because I immediately felt trust. Your professionalism and the way you communicate your knowledge made a strong impression. I just knew it would be the right decision—and it was!

reviews.name: Magdalena
reviews.content: I never thought color analysis could change my life so much! Thanks to the consultation with Asia, I understood why some colors drain me while others make me look fresh and glowy. 100% professionalism!

reviews.name: Agnieszka
reviews.content: The presentation was beautifully prepared—esthetic, clear, and perfectly suited to my beauty. I felt cared for at every stage. Now shopping is a pleasure, not a chore!

reviews.name: Karolina
reviews.content: I always thought I was a cool type, and was surprised to discover I’m a warm autumn! Thanks to the thorough analysis I changed my hair color and… I can’t stop looking at myself in the mirror. Thank you!

reviews.name: Julia
reviews.content: It wasn’t just a color analysis—it was a journey to discovering myself. The consultation was carried out with immense empathy and professionalism. Finally, I know which colors really serve me.

reviews.name: Katarzyna
reviews.content: I did a color analysis online and… I’ll never go back to random shopping! The presentation was beautiful and very concrete. It was the best decision of the year.

reviews.name: Marta
reviews.content: I had lots of doubts before the online analysis, but was totally surprised by the quality and precision. I felt like I was in a private in‑person consultation! Highly recommended from the bottom of my heart.

reviews.name: Natalia
reviews.content: I didn’t believe a palette change could make such a difference! I visually rejuvenated, learned how to pick clothes and accessories. The presentation was masterful—I got everything on a silver platter.

reviews.name: Beata
reviews.content: Asia is a master of her craft. Every detail in the presentation was refined, and the post‑analysis talk dispelled all doubts. I finally don’t waste money on 'color-draining' clothes.

reviews.name: Sylwia
reviews.content: Not only did I change clothing colors, but also my way of perceiving myself. After the consultation I understood how colors impact my well‑being and image. I recommend it to every woman!

reviews.name: Oliwia
reviews.content: Thanks to this analysis, I found my style and stopped wandering aimlessly in stores. Colors I once avoided now highlight my beauty. Huge thanks for your dedication and professionalism!

reviews.name: Izabela
reviews.content: You can see that Asia has vast experience—the consultation was factual but very friendly. The presentation was a fairytale! Everything clearly explained, with examples. I felt special.

reviews.name: Ewa
reviews.content: My style transformation began with this color analysis. The results exceeded expectations—I feel more beautiful and confident. It was the best investment in my appearance and well‑being.

reviews.name: Aneta
reviews.content: I live in a smaller town and don’t have a color analyst nearby. When I found your online offer, I knew it was for me. I didn’t need to take time off, I didn’t have to travel for hours—all was done remotely, and the result? Phenomenal! Now I know what colors suit me.

reviews.name: Joanna
reviews.content: You convinced me not just with your offer, but with yourself. You really are your own client—how you look and present yourself, and how you communicate your knowledge, makes someone immediately want the same for themselves. Thank you for showing it’s possible!

reviews.name: Patrycja
reviews.content: Your image is your calling card—everything you present is coherent, stylish, and thoughtful. I didn’t hesitate long. If someone looks this great, it means they can move that onto others.

reviews.name: Paulina
reviews.content: Before I even booked the analysis, I saw your profile and immediately thought: she knows what she’s doing. Your image speaks for itself—you are the perfect example that color analysis works. Professionalism in every detail.
